title: Senior Lens Module Engineer - Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple is where individual imaginations gather together, committing to the values that lead to great work. Every new product we build, service we create, or Apple Store experience we deliver is the result of us making each other’s ideas stronger. Apple Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with your physical space. It will allow us to do the things we love in ways never before possible — all while staying connected to the people around us. Apple is looking for a highly motivated senior lens module engineer to join Vision Optics team.
description: Do something different! Apple is looking for a world class lens module engineer that can help deliver new optics/lens technologies to products. This candidate will be working with Apple internal multi-functional teams, and lens/display vendors, managing all engineering activities (including design review, qualification plan, data review, failure analysis), and necessary to deliver the lens module in Apple Vision products. Additionally, a successful candidate needs to be collaborating closely with optical and mechanical technology leads to achieve robust lens module design, conduct tolerance analysis and design for manufacturing and reliability.
key_qualifications: Track of record on development and mass production of optical system for consumer electronics;Experience with display/optics/optical system design preferred;Flexible and collaborative, willing to work in fast paced product and technology development;Ability to develop and implement cohesive strategies to understand difficult systematic problems, perform root cause analysis and develop mitigation strategies;Strong communication and multi-functional collaboration skills;Strong presentation and social skills;5+ years of display or optics engineering work experience
education_experience: BS and a minimum of 10 years relevant industry experience
additional_requirements:
Preferred Qualifications:
-  Experience in full engineering build cycles of optics/display related products
-  Familiarity with optical modeling tools (Light Tools, Zemax, etc)
-  Experience with data analysis tools (JMP, MATLAB etc)
-  Experience with geometrical optics, diffractive optics and micro display technologies
